categories: Category:Alliance to Restore the Republic starships

nodes.text: Revt was a group of three Lambda-class T-4a shuttles used by the Rebel Alliance they were present at a Rebel supply outpost consisting of 3 Class-A cargo containers Duce and were unmanned but were going to be docked by Utility Tugs under flight group T-SE to fight back, while the other flight group T-SF was to dock with the Y-wings to ferry pilots to the fighters. Either way, they were destroyed by TIE Interceptors along with the two transports Bultz and the Container transport Moth.
The battle was recorded and adapted into the Combat chamber to train future pilots, one of which was Maarek Stele.
